content: YOSHIMOTO Yoshihide - SCHOOL OF SCIENCE THE UNIVERSITY OF TOKYO info_outline Important News search search facebook twitter youtube instagram spotify YOSHIMOTO Yoshihide Home About Us People YOSHIMOTO Yoshihide YOSHIMOTO Yoshihide Associate Professor Department of Computer Science (GR), Department of Information Science (UG), Graduate School of Information Science and Technology E-mail yosimoto@is.s.u-tokyo.ac.jp TEL Room Links http://www.cp.is.s.u-tokyo.ac.jp/?lang=en Research Field Computational Science Research Subject Computational science and parallelized simulation softwares, especially for first-principles electronic structure calculations Current Research Nowadays computer systems become very complex, especially in parallelization, since the limitation of semiconductor technology is coming up to the surface. Therefore, for further developments in computational science, close cooperation between computer science and computational science becomes necessary. Using first-principles electronic structure calculations as central materials, the laboratory is working on researches connecting computer science and computational science.
